query.sql: SELECT * FROM (SELECT OBJECT_NAME NAME, OBJECT_OWNER SCHEMA, OBJECT_TYPE TYPE, FAV_FOLDER, 'FAV_FOLDER IS NULL' FAV_FOLDER_PREDICATE FROM "SDX$FAVORITES" WHERE FAV_FOLDER IS NULL)

SELECT * FROM (SELECT OBJECT_NAME NAME, OBJECT_OWNER SCHEMA, OBJECT_TYPE TYPE, FAV_FOLDER, 'FAV_FOLDER='''||FAV_FOLDER||'''' FAV_FOLDER_PREDICATE FROM "SDX$FAVORITES" WHERE FAV_FOLDER = :PARENT_NAME AND OBJECT_TYPE='FAV_FOLDER')
SELECT * FROM (SELECT OBJECT_NAME NAME, OBJECT_OWNER SCHEMA, OBJECT_TYPE TYPE, FAV_FOLDER FROM "SDX$FAVORITES" WHERE FAV_FOLDER = :PARENT_NAME AND OBJECT_TYPE='TABLE')
SELECT * FROM (SELECT OBJECT_NAME NAME, OBJECT_OWNER SCHEMA, OBJECT_TYPE TYPE, FAV_FOLDER FROM "SDX$FAVORITES" WHERE FAV_FOLDER = :PARENT_NAME AND OBJECT_TYPE='VIEW')
